name.value: BgZ - XIS Server - Test - Scenario 1.11.3 - Serve BgZ MedicationUse resources of XXX_Rijn - XML Format

description.value: Scenario 1.11.3 - Serve BgZ MedicationUse resources of XXX_Rijn
OAuth Token for current patient
Resource.id for MedicationStatement 1
Resource.id for MedicationStatement 2
Resource.id for Medication 1
Resource.id for Medication 2
Serve MedicationStatement resource(s) for zib MedicationUse and include Medication
Test XIS server to serve MedicationStatement resources.
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 2 MedicationStatement resource(s).
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 2 Medication resource(s).

Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR MedicationStatement that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: zib-MedicationUse-medmij-bgz-test-patA-meduse1)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 MedicationStatement that contains .status = 'on-hold'
MedicationStatement resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-MedicationUse'
Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-MedicationUse-Prescriber' with .valueReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display

Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-MedicationUse-ReasonForChangeOrDiscontinuationOfUse' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.20.77.5.2.2' and .code '13' and .display
Contains .identifier with .system and .value
Contains .status 'on-hold'
Contains .category with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.20.77.5.3' and .code '6' and .display
Contains .medicationReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display

Contains .effectivePeriod with .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-MedicationUse-Duration' with .valueDuration with .value '14' and .unit 'dagen' and .system and .code 'd' and .start. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(MedicationStatement).where(id = '${zib-MedicationUse-medmij-bgz-test-patA-meduse1-id}').effective.ofType(Period).where(extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-MedicationUse-Duration').value.ofType(Duration).where(value = 14 and unit.replaceMatches('[ .,_-]+', ' ') ~ 'dagen' and system and code = 'd') and start).exists()

description.value: Contains .effectivePeriod.extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-MedicationUse-Duration' with .valueDuration with .value '14' and .unit 'dagen' and .system and .code 'd'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-8 checks if all children are present in the same parent

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(MedicationStatement).where(id = '${zib-MedicationUse-medmij-bgz-test-patA-meduse1-id}').effective.ofType(Period).extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-MedicationUse-Duration').value.ofType(Duration).where(value = 14 and unit.replaceMatches('[ .,_-]+', ' ') ~ 'dagen' and system and code = 'd').exists()

description.value: Contains .effectivePeriod with .start. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-8 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .dateAsserted
Contains .subject with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .taken 'y'
Contains .reasonCode with .text 'Plaatsing Knieprothese'
Contains .note with .text 'Volgens afspraak 2 weken na plaatsing kunstknie gestopt met medicatie'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(MedicationStatement).where(id = '${zib-MedicationUse-medmij-bgz-test-patA-meduse1-id}').note.where(text.replaceMatches('[ .,_-]+', ' ') ~ 'Volgens afspraak 2 weken na plaatsing kunstknie gestopt met medicatie').exists()

description.value: Contains .dosage with .sequence '1' and .text 'Vanaf 28 november, gedurende 14 dagen, 2 maal per dag 1T, oraal' and .timing with .repeat with .boundsDuration with .value '14' and .unit 'dagen' and .system and .code 'd' and .when 'MORN' and .when 'NIGHT' and .route with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and .code '9' and .display and .doseQuantity with .value '2.5' and .unit and .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and .code '229'. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(MedicationStatement).where(id = '${zib-MedicationUse-medmij-bgz-test-patA-meduse1-id}').dosage.where(sequence = 1 and text.replaceMatches('[ .,_-]+', ' ') ~ 'Vanaf 28 november gedurende 14 dagen 2 maal per dag 1T oraal' and timing.repeat.where(bounds.ofType(Duration).where(value = 14 and unit.replaceMatches('[ .,_-]+', ' ') ~ 'dagen' and system and code = 'd') and when.where($this = 'MORN') and when.where($this = 'NIGHT')) and route.coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and code = '9' and display) and dose.ofType(Quantity).where(value = 2.5 and unit and system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and code = '229')).exists()

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Medication that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: zib-Product-medmij-bgz-test-patA-product1)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Medication that contains .code.coding.code = '2182416'
Medication resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Product'
Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Product-Description' with .valueString '2.5mg Apixaban filmomhulde tabletten'
Contains .code with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.7' and .code '2182416' and .display and .text 'Apixaban 2.5mg'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Medication).where(id = '${zib-Product-medmij-bgz-test-patA-product1-id}').code.where(coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.7' and code = '2182416' and display) and text.replaceMatches('[ .,_-]+', ' ') ~ 'Apixaban 2 5mg').exists()
